overview: When Kristen Scott expertly fakes being too sick for school on her 18th birthday, her slutty best friend Melissa Moore comes to pick her up after taking the juice out of squirting Latina Veronica Rodriguez. Kristen borrows Melissa's rich father's favorite car to get her lesbian girlfriend Kimmy Granger out of class, then home to lose their virginity. After fucking for their first time ever, Kimmy talks Kristen into having a birthday threesome with big titted Melissa that very same day.
title: Kristen Scott's Skip Day
